column1: #Text=" Zuko says : " Next time you get in my way , I promise , I wo n't hold back .
#Text=So this is how the great Commander Zhao acts in defeat ?
#Text=Even in exile , my nephew is more honorable than you .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Did you really mean that , Uncle ?
#Text=I told you ginseng tea is my favorite .
#Text=I know you 're upset and I know how hard it is to lose the people you love .
#Text=I went through the same thing when I lost my mom .
#Text=Monk Gyatso and the other airbenders may be gone , but you still have a family .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara and I are n't going to let anything happen to you .
#Text=" Aang says : " But you were right .
#Text=And if the firebenders found this temple , that means they found the other ones , too .
#Text=" Aang says : " How is Roku supposed to help me if I ca n't talk to him ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe you 'll find a way .
#Text=" Aang says : " Looks like you made a new friend Sokka !
